name: Frostfire Belt
tooltip:
Frostfire BeltLevel 60

Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Frostfire Belt if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Belt, 8 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 2 Arcane Crystals and 2 Mooncloth.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Belt
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 8
- Arcane Crystal x 2
- Mooncloth x 2
